title: Setter for Med Spa
job_overview:
Appointment Setter 
We are a wellness spa, a luxury anti-aging face & body spa located on Manhattan’s Upper East Side. We specialize in non-invasive treatments designed to detoxify, sculpt, and rejuvenate. Our brand is built on integrity, empowerment, and excellence—and we’re rapidly growing.
We’re seeking a highly motivated, goal-driven Appointment Setter who will be the first point of contact for potential clients. If you're charismatic, organized, and love closing appointments, this is your chance to grow with a premium brand at the forefront of luxury wellness.
Duties::
• Reach out to leads via various social media platforms, text messages, email, etc. 
• Qualify leads, build trust, and guide them into booking a consultation or service
• Develop and follow daily scripts and sales prompts while adding a personalized touch
• Nurture warm leads with follow-ups, check-ins, and timely responses
• Maintain lead tracking in a CRM or spreadsheet system
• Hit weekly and monthly KPI goals for booked appointments
• Collaborate with the marketing team to identify high-potential lead sources
• Assist in generating new leads through outreach strategies and creative engagement
• Assisting CEO in special projects 
You Are:
• You love talking to people and have a natural ability to build rapport quickly
• You’re self-motivated, ambitious, and get excited about hitting goals
• You have experience in appointment setting, sales, client outreach, or DMs
• You’re confident using Instagram, text platforms, and tools like Slack or CRM software
• You’re detail-oriented, organized, and always follow up
• You have excellent written communication with a polished tone
• Experience in aesthetics, wellness, or spa industry
Must Have:
• Experience in appointment setting 
• Experience in aesthetics, wellness, or spa industry
• Must be actively interested in various spa treatments 
• Self-motivated, ambitious, and get excited about hitting goals

Other:
--Graduated from a top university, Graduated with honors, Passed licensure exam
--Document and spreadsheet skills, with an ability to become familiar with firm-specific programs and software
--Proficiency in collaboration and delegation of duties, Eager and motivated, Positive attitude, Polite and professional
--Friendly and professional demeanor, Reliable and task-oriented, organized
--Team player, Dedicated and committed, Desire to learn new things
--Willingness to work very early morning or nights
--No other work commitments

How to Apply:
If you are a proactive, highly organized, and creative individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you! Please send your resume, along with a cover letter detailing your relevant experience, to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line "Setter (dot) VA Application (dot) First Name (dot) Last Name (dot) Date.”
